message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I know you'll find it highly valuable.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Please let me know if this is possible.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to increase my offer to $12,500. This is the highest amount I can afford for this product.
